body.name: 100% Linen Drawstring Casual Pants for Men, Regular Fit, Lightweight (Waist Size 29-54 Big & Tall)
features: 100% LINEN: Experience lightweight comfort and breathability with these casual pants for men. Crafted from 100% linen fabric which allows air to effortlessly pass through it, keeping you cool and comfortable throughout the day.

DRAWSTRING WAISTBAND: Elevate your comfort and style with these linen pants for men. Featuring a convenient drawstring waistband that helps keep the pants in place throughout the day while allowing you to customize the fit for maximum comfort.

REGULAR FIT: Move easily in these linen drawstring pants for men, designed with a comfortable looser cut through the thighs and legs. Featuring a sleek flat front style, providing a modern and clean silhouette that compliments your casual attire.

EXTENDED SIZES: These men’s casual pants are available in regular and big & tall sizes; we've got the right fit for you. Enjoy their lightweight feel and embrace the freedom to move effortlessly while looking effortlessly cool.

EASY CARE: These versatile drawstring linen pants for men can be easily machine washed and dried. While they may require light ironing, you'll love the low-maintenance nature of these pants that keep you looking sharp without the extra time and effort.
body.description: Indulge in ultimate relaxation at home or take a sunny stroll along the waterfront with these light and breathable 100% linen pants for men from Perry Ellis. These pants are designed for comfort and style, featuring a sleek flat front design and convenient open pockets for storing small essentials. The drawstring waistband ensures a secure fit that stays in place throughout the day. A comfortable regular fit offers a bit more room through the thighs and legs, allowing for easy movement. Best of all, these pants can be machine washed and dried, with light ironing needed, making them incredibly low-maintenance. Embrace effortless style with these versatile pants that keep you looking great without the extra time and effort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perry Ellis Linen Drawstring Casual Pants - A Perfect Blend of Comfort and Style!
reviews.reviewText: The Perry Ellis 100% Linen Drawstring Casual Pants for Men have completely impressed me with their unbeatable combination of comfort, style, and quality. These pants have quickly become a wardrobe staple, and here's why I'm so thrilled with them: Breathable Linen Fabric: The 100% linen fabric is a game-changer, especially in warm weather. It keeps me cool and comfortable even on the hottest days. The breathability is unmatched, making these pants perfect for summer. Regular Fit Perfection: The regular fit strikes a perfect balance between comfort and style. These pants are neither too baggy nor too tight, making them suitable for a variety of occasions, from casual outings to semi-formal events. Wide Range of Sizes: The availability of waist sizes ranging from 29 to 54, including Big & Tall options, is highly commendable. It ensures that men of all body types can find the perfect fit. Drawstring Waist: The drawstring waist not only adds a touch of casual flair but also provides adjustability for a customized fit. It's a thoughtful feature that I appreciate. Lightweight and Travel-Friendly: These pants are incredibly lightweight, making them an excellent choice for travel. They take up minimal space in a suitcase and are easy to pack and unpack. Classic Style: The classic design and versatile color options make these pants a go-to choice for a range of occasions. They can be dressed up with a button-down shirt or dressed down with a casual tee. Quality Construction: The pants are well-constructed and feel durable. The attention to detail in stitching and finishing ensures they can withstand regular wear. Easy Care: Linen can sometimes be seen as high-maintenance, but these pants are surprisingly easy to care for. They wash well and don't require excessive ironing. Affordable Luxury: Considering the quality and style of these pants, they offer excellent value for the price. They provide a touch of luxury without breaking the bank.In conclusion, the Perry Ellis 100% Linen Drawstring Casual Pants for Men are a wardrobe essential that combines comfort, style, and versatility. Whether you're planning a summer vacation, a casual weekend outing, or a semi-formal event, these pants are up for the task. They cater to a wide range of sizes and preferences, ensuring a perfect fit for everyone. I wholeheartedly recommend them; they're a five-star addition to any wardrobe!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable - look great, fit great
reviews.reviewText: Well made, look very nice. Purchased for very picky tall and slim teenager. He loves them !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Positive PRE CLEANING EVALUATION....
reviews.reviewText: I have always been skeptical when ordering clothes on line.I was looking for a summer weight (linen) casual pair of slacks and came across several marketplace sellers.I decided to go with one pr. from each of the better names (knowing that the manufacturing was outside of U.S). OF the two pair the PERRY ELLIS pant was far superior in fit ,style and material.Linen is a great look for summer casual .These slacks will be worn for my summer touring and casual dining . They are advertised as beach pants but they are much more. I dont think I would throw this on to cover a dried out pair of swim suit. Rather wear them to the bar at poolside or a restaurant by the ocean. This pair is tied in front with a draw string but also has belt loops (which some may prefer) which I would not attempt to use as it takes away from casual look. I went with the natural (straw) color so I could have more if a selection of tops. I am right about that knowing whats in my closet...... My only concern with any linen or cotton clothing is " what will happen when cleaned (shrinkage). All linen and pure cotton clothing is advisable to hand wash in cool water , hang dry and iron at cool setting. I have not had the opportunity as of this evaluation to clean this garment. But I will follow the directions and hope for the best. Please note that I am on the thin side and feel these slacks are almost a perfect fit for a summer slacks which follow my contour and are not tight but feel very comfortable.If I find that after a cleaning a size change such as shrinkage or thread wear occurs I will add this to my evaluation.I know I will enjoy this pair up to and hopefully after it's first cleaning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Love these pants and bought several times
reviews.reviewText: Great fit and as promised. Bought a fewPairs in the past and they wear well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great inexpensive linen pants
reviews.reviewText: I don't write many product reviews but I absolutely live these linen pants. I haven't washed them yet and I've only worn them for 1 day so I'll have to wait and see how they fair through the abuse but they are cooling and soft and look great. Hopefully they hold up, but as of now I highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 4 Chances to say, "No"
reviews.reviewText: Great pair of slacks. My normal size is 34W 32L. What you should know...1. Length after cold water wash and line dry is 32 inches, measured.2. Waist runs 1 inch large and a 33W fit perfectly. Waist is 18 inches across, measured.3. They are not see through, a typical looser linen weave. They are linen slacks...4. Given #3 above, extremely comfortable.5. These have a 4 button fly. NO zipper. 4 buttons.Some reviews gripe a bit about the button fly. In my 20's & 30's used to wear Levis 501 button fly jeans. My old Navy dress whites had button flies. Therefore, I do not find the button fly on these slacks "odd", "strange", or "difficult". I rather like the idea of the vintage look/feel, and 4 chances to say, "No". Order them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable but not durable
reviews.reviewText: They fit well, they look good, and six months later they all have holes in them. Since I need new pants, I won't be buying these again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light Weight and Comfortable
reviews.reviewText: Arrived as expected.The fit is spot on. Other reviews mentioned an issue with the pants being somewhat transparent. I put on the darkest pair of underwear I own, stood by the brightest light I have and have no issue.I'd buy again.

reviews.reviewTitle: So comfortable. Great for hot weather.
reviews.reviewText: I bought these for a beach vacation but used them all summer.These pants are very comfortable.The drawstring waist is also excellent.They fit me perfectly. For reference, I'm a 34 waist from Old Navy and the Gap.

Je fais du 46 de pantalon. Ce pantalon est du 50 pouces. En plus ils sont trop longues. Ce qui va occasionner une rencontre avec ma couturière. Normalement je devrais les rapporter et acheter des 44 de taille. Mais les 44 sont deux fois le prix des 46. Je dis mazette.

I use these to match a linen jacket brought from elsewhere, and the good thing is that the natural linen look and colour do match pretty well between the two. The pants have belt loops as well as the draw string, and I use a belt when I'm wearing the jacket with the pants, I hide away the draw strings inside the pants becasue that more formal look works (for me anyway) with the jacket, but I use the draw string sometimes when I wear them alone. Good to have those options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 19, 2017
